H0.text: Which cryptic heptarchy owned a Cocker Spaniel called Scamper. Famous Five

H1.text: Which cryptic heptarchy owned a Cocker Spaniel called Scamper. The Babysitters Club

H2.text: Which cryptic heptarchy owned a Cocker Spaniel called Scamper. The Hardy Boys

H3.text: Which cryptic heptarchy owned a Cocker Spaniel called Scamper. Secret Seven

A4.text: Scamper â€“ Janet and Peter's pet dog and beloved companion. He is not an official member of the Secret Seven, but the children count him as one, due to his regular usefulness in the denouement of the stories.

A5.text: Scamper is installed as his temporary replacement. Some shadowing by Colin puts the Seven on the trail of a man who shoves dogs down a coal hole.
